Checks.title: Your Checks
Checks.no_existing_checks: No checks found. Create a new one

CollaboratorSelection.command_empty_min_input: You must provide at least 3 characters to find matches

QuestionSection.title: Questions
QuestionSection.no_questions_info: Currently there are no questions associated to this quiz

OverviewSection.title: Preview Changes
OverviewSection.description: Here is a brief overview of what changes were made

Header.description_create: Create your new question for your KnowledgeCheck
Header.description_edit: Edit your existing question of your KnowledgeCheck

tooltips.drag_drop_correct_position: The correct position for this answer

UnsavedChangesAlert.title: You have unsaved changes. Discard?
UnsavedChangesAlert.description: By leaving the page now the change you have made will be permanently lost.

Discover.title: Explore new Checks
Discover.no_checks_found_base: No checks found. Create your own KnowledgeCheck

attempt_not_possible.title: Examination not possible
attempt_not_possible.checkClosed: Unfortunately the check was closed on {closeDate}, thus you are no longer able to start examinations beyond that day.
attempt_not_possible.notOpenYet: Unfortunately the check is not yet open for examinations, please wait until {openDate} to start an examination
attempt_not_possible.unavailable: The check you tried to access is currently not available to users.
attempt_not_possible.anonymous-users-not-allowed: Anonymous users are not allowed in this check, please sign-in / login with a different account

practicing_not_allowed.title: Practicing not allowed
practicing_not_allowed.disabled: Practicing is disabled for this check, try again later or contact the owner of this check to enable practicing.
practicing_not_allowed.toManyAttempts: You have unfortunately reached the allowed practice attempt count of {allowedAttemptCount} for this check.

ShareKnowledgeCheckButton.tooltip_empty_message: This check has no questions, cannot be shared at this moment.
ShareKnowledgeCheckButton.successfully_copied_toast_message: Successfully saved token to your clipboard.
ShareKnowledgeCheckButton.failed_copy_toast_message: Failed to copy share link to the clipboard.

copy_practice.label: Copy Practice Link
copy_practice.toast_success: Successfully saved practice url to clipboard.
copy_practice.toast_failure: Failed to copy practice link to clipboard.

start_practice.label: Start Practicing
start_practice.tooltip: This check has no questions, practice disabled.

copy_examination.label: Copy Examination Link
copy_examination.toast_success: Successfully saved exam url to clipboard.
copy_examination.toast_failure: Failed to copy exam link to clipboard.

start_examination.label: Start Examination
start_examination.tooltip: This check has no questions, examination disabled.

edit_check.label: Edit KnowledgeCheck
edit_check.tooltip: You are not allowed to edit this check!

remove_share_token.tooltip: There is no share token associated to this check!
remove_share_token.confirmation_dialog_body: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the share-token from this KnowledgeCheck.

delete_knowledgeCheck.label: Delete KnowledgeCheck
delete_knowledgeCheck.confirmation_dialog_body: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this KnowledCheck from your account and remove its data from our servers.

Shared.tooltip_not_allowed: You are not allowed to perform this action!
Shared.toast_deletion_not_found: Deletion was unsuccesful, check not found!

ConfirmationDialog.default_body: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this element from your account and remove its data from our servers.
